DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Examining Efficacy Biomodulator Treatment Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: active duty Service Members ( SMs ) age 18 62 , inclusive history chronic LBP ( i.e . intermittent continuous LBP symptom present 3 month great prior entry study participant must use narcotic and/or nonnarcotic oral analgesic medication treat chronic LBP symptom weekly basis must able speak read English understand study procedure pacemaker implant electronic device history stroke , blood clot , cardiac arrhythmia pregnancy selfreported history prescription medication abuse soleprovider contract prescribe narcotic medication open wound site chronic pain ; history spinal surgery participation clinical trial investigational drug/ treatment within last 30 day undergone treatment TENS , biofeedback , acupuncture within last 30 day prior treatment Biomodulator LBP `` red flag '' : fever , trauma , progressive motor sensory deficit , saddle anesthesia participation study would delay medical board ( MEB ) processing service member active duty status would delay return duty status home unit
